title: Scrollbars should be disabled in ImageAnalyzer example
description: The scrollbars in the ImageAnalyzer example are enabled but do not have any effect when moved. This can be misleading, especially when opening small images such as icons.
OB: When opening the ImageAnalyzer example, the scrollbars are enabled and can be moved around.
EB: The scrollbars should be disabled in the ImageAnalyzer example since they do not have any effect.
SR: 1. Open the ImageAnalyzer example. 2. Observe that the scrollbars are enabled and can be moved around. 3. Notice that the scrollbars do not have any effect when moved.
